name: Headache (itch) (PossiblyAxolotl)
description:
Headache is a top down shooter I made for Nvidia's forgotten console, the Nvidia Shield Portable.
Kill enemies, collect coins, and buy upgrades to see how many waves you can survive.

A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED

Controls:  left stick to move around, right stick to aim, right trigger to shoot, select/start to  pause

Watch the devlog:

COMING SOON

Music: '0 to 100' by Of Far Different Nature (https://fardifferent.bandcamp.com/)
